title: The Crown's Josh O'Connor: ‘Prince Charles is an incredible man. I’m mildly in love with him’
text:
He’s wearing the crown – and the polo kit, and the tweed – as the new Prince of Wales in The Crown. But, as he tells Guy Kelly, the role has changed actor Josh O’Connor’s life in more ways than he expected

‘Cutlery,’ Josh O’Connor says, having thought about it for a moment. ‘I think cutlery was the worst.’ I’ve asked him what, over the many months, days and hours of research and preparation he undertook before playing the Prince of Wales in Netflix’s upcoming third series of The Crown, he found most taxing.

He could have said capturing the Prince’s unique drawl or familiar mannerisms. He could have said learning to ride a horse, or playing polo to a convincing standard. He could have said mastering...
